aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.intro: Hello! I am {name}, a software engineer passionate about technology and innovation. I am proficient in using tools, learning new knowledge on the internet, and focusing on web development and application design. I enjoy learning new technologies and applying them to practical projects, striving to provide efficient and reliable solutions.
aboutMe.experience: Throughout my career, I have participated in multiple projects, from requirement analysis, system design to final implementation, accumulating a lot of experience. I believe that teamwork and continuous learning are the keys to success, and I always maintain a passion and curiosity for technology.
aboutMe.welcome: Welcome to browse my personal website to learn more about me. If you have any questions or cooperation intentions, please feel free to contact me.
